casebody.data:
LLOYD, Alias LOYD v. WARDEN OF MARYLAND PENITENTIARY [No. 44,

September Term, 1961.]

Decided December 26, 1961.

Before Bruñe, C. J., and Henderson, Hammond, Prescott, Horney, Marbury and Sybert, JJ.

*659PER Curiam.

For the reasons stated by Judge Harlan for dismissing the petition, the application for leave to appeal is denied.

Application denied.
